channel.title: Compile error with the command yell
channel.description:
okay im trying to make it say [owner] God11: when i yell but i got 6 errors here they are
[code]client.java:13997: cannot find symbol symbol : variable text location: class client + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) ^ client.java:13998: cannot find symbol symbol : variable text location: class client + text.substring(1) + ""; ^ client.java:14001: cannot find symbol symbol : variable text location: class client + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) ^ client.java:14002: cannot find symbol symbol : variable text location: class client + text.substring(1) + ""; ^ client.java:14005: cannot find symbol symbol : variable text location: class client + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) ^ client.java:14006: cannot find symbol symbol : variable text location: class client + text.substring(1) + ""; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 6 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
whats that mean?
